history.content:
This is True.

You need to complete the general ed for every college you receive a degree from. Since a minor is a transcript notation and not a Bachelor's degree, no general education is required.

L&S is starting a movement of requiring students to declare their minor at least a semester before they graduate, so make sure you're checking the minor dept website for requirements/processes.

I am currently EECS major, and I hope to minor music from L&S. I heard that if I only wanted to minor, I only need to complete all of minor courses from the department and do not need to complete the L&S breadths. Can someone confirm this?
history.subject: COE major minoring LS

history.content: I am currently EECS major, and I hope to minor Math from L&S. I heard that if I only wanted to minor, I only need to complete all of minor courses from the department and do not need to complete the L&S breadths. Can someone confirm this?
